import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' export const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu]= useState("shop"); const {getTotalCartItems} = useContext(ShopContext) return (

SHOPPER

  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop {menu === "shop" ?
    : <>}
  • {setMenu("mens")}}>Men{menu === "mens" ?
    : <>}
  • {setMenu("womens")}}>Women{menu === "womens" ?
    : <>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}>Kids{menu === "kids" ?
    : <>}
{getTotalCartItems()}
) }
